description: This table contains multiple diagnosis related group information for hospital accounts.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The hospital account ID with associated Single Billing Office information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DRG_ID_TYPE_ID
columns.description: From the list of diagnosis-related group (DRG) filed to the hospital account, the unique ID of DRG code set for this row.

columns.name: DRG_ID_TYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: DRG_MPI_CODE
columns.description: This column extracts the Master Patient Index (MPI) IDs of diagnosis-related group (DRG) codes entered in the Multiple DRG grid of Hospital Billing - Coding for each Hospital Account.  The MPI IDs shown here will be the IDs that correspond to the DRG MPI Type extracted in the DRG_ID_TYPE_ID column.

columns.name: DRG_REIMBURSEMENT
columns.description: From the list of diagnosis-related groups (DRGs) filed to the hospital account, the expected reimbursement amount for the DRG in this row.

columns.name: DRG_MDC_VALUE
columns.description: From the list of diagnosis-related group (DRG) filed to the hospital account, the Major Diagnostic Category value for the DRG in this row.

columns.name: DRG_WEIGHT
columns.description: From the list of DRGs filed to the hospital account, the weight for the DRG in this row.

columns.name: DRG_PS_NAME
columns.description:
From the list of diagnosis-related groups (DRGs) filed to the hospital account, the severity of illness (SOI) category ID associated with the DRG in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Refinement not possible


Minor


Moderate


Major


Extreme


Principal Dx Used for SOI/ROM Calc


Excluded


Duplicate Diagnosis


Excluded Complication of Care

columns.name: DRG_ROM_NAME
columns.description:
The unique ID of the user record who created this history row. This column is frequently used to link to the Clarity  user records table.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DRG_PS_NAME

columns.name: DRG_SHORT_LOS
columns.description: The unique identifier for the treatment plan record.

columns.name: DRG_LONG_LOS
columns.description: From the list of diagnosis-related group (DRG) filed to the hospital account, the long length of stay for the DRG in this row.

columns.name: DRG_AMLOS
columns.description: From the list of DRGs filed to the hospital account, the arithmetic mean length of stay for the DRG in this row.

columns.name: DRG_GMLOS
columns.description: From the list of diagnosis-related group (DRG) filed to the hospital account, the geometric mean length of stay for the DRG in this row.

columns.name: DRG_CST_OTLR_THRSH
columns.description: The diagnosis-related group (DRG) cost outlier threshold for the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_DAY_OTLR_THRSH
columns.description: The diagnosis-related group (DRG) day outlier threshold for the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_NRM_PT_RMB_AMT
columns.description: The normal patient reimbursal amount for diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_TG_FED_BLND_RT
columns.description: The target fed blended rate for DRG on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_COND_CODE
columns.description: The diagnosis-related group (DRG) condition code on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_FORMULA
columns.description: The diagnosis-related group (DRG) formula information on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_LOS
columns.description: The diagnosis-related group (DRG) LOS for the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_PAT_STATUS
columns.description: The patient status for the diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_ISP_SHR_AJ_AMT
columns.description: The dispensed share adjustment amount for the diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_INDIR_MED_AMT
columns.description: The indirect medicated monetary amount for the diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_CAPITAL_AMT
columns.description: The capital monetary amount for the DRG on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_OTLR_RMB_AMT
columns.description: The outlier reimbursement monetary amount for the diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_CHG_CLM_AMT
columns.description: The total diagnosis-related group (DRG) charges on claim for this DRG on this hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_OUTLIER_TYPE
columns.description: The outlier type for the diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_OUTLIER_DAYS
columns.description: The number of outlier days for the diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_OTLR_CST_AMT
columns.description: The monetary outlier cost for the diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_OUTLIER_REIMB
columns.description: The outlier reimbursement for the diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_CMT
columns.description: The comment associated with the diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_QLFR_C_NAME
columns.description:
Additional diagnosis-related group (DRG) Qualifier for the DRG Type and Code.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


HAC Dx Included


Analyzed DRG


Admission DRG


PPC DRG


PPC Admit DRG

columns.name: DRG_BILLING_FLAG_YN
columns.description:
Indicates the diagnosis-related group (DRG) that is the primary Billing DRG for the hospital account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DRG_ECCS
columns.description: The ECCS (episode clinical complexity score) associated with the DRG.
